hints.content:
We start at $2{:}32$ when Amira starts raking leaves.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 2:32. !

hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents $1$ minute.

So, we need to move **right** on the number line $45$ minutes.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{2{:}32} +{} &\greenD{3}\text{ minutes} = 2{:}35\\\\
2{:}35 +{} & \purpleD{40}\text{ minutes} = 3{:}15 \\\\
3{:}15 +{}&\goldE{2}\text{ minutes} = \goldE{3{:}17}\\\\
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A series of three arrows are shown moving left to right from the 2:32 tick mark to the 3:17 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 2:32 tick mark and ends at the 2:35 tick mark and is labeled plus 3. The second arrow starts at the 2:35 tick mark and ends at the 3:15 tick mark and is labeled plus 40. The third arrow starts at the 3:15 tick mark and ends at the 3:17 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Amira finishes raking leaves at $3{:}17\text{ p.m.}$

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 3:17. !

question.content:
Amira starts raking leaves at $2{:}32\text{ p.m.}$ She finishes $45$ minutes later. 

**Which number line below graphs when Amira finishes raking leaves?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 2:45.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bb2b47db61475df1db4ac71d9ea08af54902ea66)
![A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 3:12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e2ab41718014c7b54ccd9b2d2630c4c98ae4b485)
![A number line labeled 2:30 to 3:30 with tick marks every 1 unit. A point is marked at 3:17.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c7d75b86ebf319444a701a7009232a28ccaf2c3e)
